title: In second victory Tuesday, Republicans hang onto Matt Gaetz's House seat
shortDescription: Republican Jimmy Patronis beat Democrat Gay Valimont. The party also held another Florida seat in Tuesday's special election.

title: Sen. Cory Booker gives record-breaking Senate speech
shortDescription: Democratic Sen. Cory Booker broke the record for longest Senate speech, rebuking the Trump Administration for over 24 hours.

title: Trump administration cuts FDA staff handling bird flu
shortDescription: Federal regulators were responsible for recalling pet food contaminated with bird flu, which killed household cats.

title: Booker delivers longest known Senate speech, beating Strom Thurmond
shortDescription: The Democratic senator from New Jersey began speaking at 7 p.m. Monday and continued into Tuesday evening.

title: Trump to hold meeting on potential buyers of TikTok ahead of deadline
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will meet Wednesday with top members of his administration to consider potential investors who could purchase stake in TikTok.

title: Live: GOP holds Florida congressional seats, Wisconsin supreme court on ballot
shortDescription: The Badger State hosts the nation's most expensive court race to date, while the Sunshine State seeks to fill two House seats in deep red districts.

title: Melania Trump honors women who have shown 'courage'
shortDescription: Since 2007, the State Department has recognized more than 200 women for "promoting peace and prosperity and human rights" countries across the world.

title: When do Trump's tariffs go into effect? President eyes expanded policies
shortDescription: Donald Trump is expected to expand his tariffs on Wednesday in a day he is dubbing 'Liberation Day.'

title: GOP, Democrats grapple over judiciary power
shortDescription: Congress held a hearing over the judiciary's role as multiple injunctions come on the heels of President Trump's executive orders.

title: President Trump decides size of tariffs, still 'perfecting' final plan
shortDescription: President Trump has made up his mind on the size of upcoming sweeping reciprocal tariffs and is "perfecting" the final details, the White House said.

title: Voters head to the polls to for Wisconsin Supreme Court race
shortDescription: Voters cast their ballot in the Wisconsin Supreme Court race on April 1, 2025, for liberal Susan Crawford or conservative Brad Schimel.

title: Wisconsin voters cast ballots in key judicial race
shortDescription: Wisconsin voters will decide if Trump-backed judge Brad Schimel or liberal judge Susan Crawford should fill a vacant Supreme Court seat.

title: Republicans in Congress heed Trump's calls to rein in federal judges
shortDescription: Furious over nationwide injunctions, Congressional Republicans are seeking to limit the impact of the federal judiciary.

title: Is Elon Musk's time at the Trump White House nearing the end?
shortDescription: "I'd keep him as long as I could keep him," President Trump said of the Tesla and SpaceX CEO.

title: Trump muses about unconstitutional 2028 bid against Barack Obama
shortDescription: Trump entertained by idea of unconstitutional 2028 election against Barack Obama.

title: Agriculture Dept offers buyouts as Trump slashes workforce
shortDescription: USDA employees who opt by April 8 would be put on leave with full pay and benefits through September 30, said an email to staff shared with Reuters.

title: Democrats sue Trump administration over election executive order
shortDescription: The Democratic Party on Monday filed a lawsuit to block Trump's executive order overhauling the US election system.

title: Democratic-led states sue to block Trump's $11 billion health cut
shortDescription: Democratic-led states sued the Trump administration challenging its cut of $11 billion in federal grants allocated during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Cory Booker filibuster tackles government cuts
shortDescription: A Senate floor filibuster from Sen. Cory Booker tackled possible government spending cuts from Medicaid to Social Security.
